title: saxydev
author: saxydev
content: Looking for people from South America to learn about the crypto space there and obtain links which may help with finding some scams/phishing which originate from the continent.If you speak spanish or portuguesse and you know how to use google but you are not from South America, you can still hit me up on discord.I can pay up to 50$ for any good informationsexydevil#4228Note: useless posts will be deleted.
